author: Stereogum
title: Slowdive Announce First New Album in 22 Years; Watch “Sugar For The Pill”
text: '90s shoegaze heavyweights Slowdive broke up in 1995, shortly after the release of their album Pygmalion. The reunited to tour three years ago, and now they're getting ready to release a new self-titled album, their first in 22 years. Slowdive, in fact, is coming out in just over a month -- so after waiting … More »
